name: youtubedl-material
description: YoutubeDL-Material is a self-hosted web front-end for yt-dlp/youtube-dl. It lets users queue, download, and manage videos and audio from many sites, storing them in organized folders with metadata.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Download videos and audio from YouTube and hundreds of other sites through a modern browser

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Add multiple URLs to a download queue and process them sequentially or in parallel

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Store videos with proper filenames, thumbnails, and metadata in organized folder structures

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create multiple users with individual download histories, subscriptions, and storage quotas

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Review all past downloads with search, filtering, and re-download capabilities
